bs-qr-code-extension-description: Displays a QR code with a link to the current page in the toolbar.
bs-qr-code-text: Scan QR code to open this page on a mobile device
apihelp-bs-qr-code-summary: Get QR code as base64 data URI for a page
apihelp-bs-qr-code-param-revid: Revision id of the page to generate a permalink
apihelp-bs-qr-code-param-page: Page name of the page to generate base64 data URI
apihelp-bs-qr-code-example-bs-qr-code-wi: API call for a certain revid
